title: all keen downloadables
content: i remember finding a site shortly after i bought the complete series off of ebay that presented full downloads of all the keen games but dont know where it is. does anyone know of any sites that has all of them?Swim,Swim,Hungry!

title: Downloads?
content:
http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/board.html
[quote]Quote:[hr]
III. Some things you may not do:
{...}
Offer or request pirated copies of any commercial software (this includes Keens 2, 3, 5 and the registered versions of 6 and Dreams!)
[hr][/quote]
Sorry, dude.

title: Re: Downloads?
content:
Yep, no sharing Keens on this board!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
